title: Reserve Bank asks NBFCs to implement core financial services solution by Sep 2025 - Economic Times
content: Reserve Bank asks NBFCs to implement core financial services solution by Sep 2025  Economic Times
description: In a circular, Reserve Bank of India (RBI) said it has been decided that NBFCs - Middle Layer and NBFCs - Upper Layer with 10 and more 'fixed point service delivery units' as on October 1, 2022 shall be mandatorily required to implement CFSS.
